info.name: username
info.description: The username of the account that will be used for record retrieval

info.name: password
info.description: The password of the account that will be used for record retrieval.

info.name: token
info.description: The security token associated with the account used for record retrieval. To reset this value, log into Saleforce using the desired account and navigate to Setup -> My Personal Information -> Reset Security Token. A new token will be emailed to you.
